metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14682 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in mspack/chmd.c in libmspack before 0.7alpha. There is an off-by-one error in the TOLOWER() macro for CHM decompression.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14682` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmspack0 - 0.6-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> clamav in xenial+ uses the system libmspack, trusty uses the embedded one.

criterions.comment: libmspack package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6-3ubuntu0.1').
